scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises numerous account statements, receipts, bills, and checks in addition to letters, a mostly blank checkbook, and renewals of John Hunt Morgan's note with the First and City National Bank of Lexington, Kentucky. The account statements, receipts, bills, and checks which make up the majority of this folder document goods and services purchased by Mrs. Ellen Howard Morgan and her daughter, Miss Ellen "Nellie" Key Howard Morgan, from businesses in Lexington, Kentucky, and monthly payments of water, gas, and telephone bills for their shared residence. Two letters from Harrison S. Morris to Virginia Jeffrey Morgan discuss publishing the sonnet she wrote. Three letters from McHenry Howard to his sister, Mrs. Ellen Howard Morgan, discuss their rental properties and money.
